EmailTemplate.name: Step 4 - Utility Reviewing Interconnection
EmailTemplate.subject: Update From Palmetto On Your Project
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Contact__c},
We hope all is well, we wanted to provide you with an update as to what stage your solar installation project was in.
Please see the attachment on this email for an update about your project.
Thank You,
Palmetto Customer Care 855-339-1831 customer.care@palmetto.com
